Whitman College Another Link

Large Promo Component with a long title

From Whitman Magazine: What will residence life be like for future Whitties? Here's how the new Living at Whitman Initiative will bring a new sophomore residence hall and dining facilities to life, in the biggest change to campus in decades.

Whitman College Another Link

Athleticssss

Whitman competes in Division III of the NCAA Northwest Conference in seven men's and eight women's athletic programs. Visit the Whitman Athletics website for news and information about Whitman's varsity athletics program. Recent headlines:

  • Blues take 3 of 4 from Whitworth
  • NWC names Nguyen SAOW
  • Blues put up 13 hits in loss to Bruins
